document.full_text: massachusetts clam chowder faces off with smoked salmon from british columbia in a politicians' bet over whether the stanley cup will go home with the boston bruins or the vancouver canucks.
document.title: stanley cup bet: boston chowder vs. vancouver salmon
lines_and_colors: massachusetts clam chowder faces off with smoked salmon from british columbia in a politicians' bet over whether the stanley cup will go home with the boston bruins or the vancouver canucks.
